isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1997) - SECTION 3.5: CIRCUIT FUNCTION AND DIAGNOSTICS - ENGINE DATA LINE (EDL) WITH ALLISON AT/MT TRANSMISSION - TROUBLESHOOTING

step1.para: Before troubleshooting, make sure that the batteries are fully charged! Check battery cables and grounds for clean, tight connections free from damage. The voltage tests will give misleading readings if the batteries are not fully charged.

Before troubleshooting, inspect connectors for pushed back, loose or damaged (spread or bent) terminals, or wires with cut strands etc. Wires and connections must be free of damage or corrosion. When some connectors corrode, a light white residue will be present that must be removed.
Before troubleshooting, inspect the suspect circuit grounds for clean, tight connections free of any damage.
